name: NBA 2K6
description: NBA 2K6 hits the hardwood on Xbox 360™ ready to continue its reign as the best and most authentic pro basketball game. Achieve NBA superstar status with the new 24/7 mode, where created players partake in training camps, competitions, and even land endorsement deals. Elevate your game by utilizing the innovative V.I.P. System to challenge virtual versions of your friends and other NBA 2K6 ballers across the country.
